price: 14. Ezali boye te, kaši mitema miabango mizali na mbindo na maye bazalaki kosala,
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
